narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: First Choice Home Care, LLC is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Yazoo City, MS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $105.9M in Medicaid payments across 1.2M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $105.9M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,241 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
